core.planner
Class Variable

java.lang.Object
  core.planner.Variable
All Implemented Interfaces:
Standardizable, Substituable, Term, java.lang.Cloneable
public final class Variable
extends java.lang.Object
implements Term

The Variable class implements a variable.

unify

public Substitution unify(Term t)
                   throws UnificationException
Returns the most general unifier of two terms.

Specified by:
unify in interface Term
Parameters:
t - the Term to unify.
Returns:
the most general unifier or null if it does not exist. An empty mgu means that there is no binding Variable between t and this term.
Throws:
UnificationException - if t is not an instance of Variable.

unify

public Substitution unify(Term t,
                          Substitution alpha)
                   throws UnificationException
Returns the most general unifier of two terms. Prior binding variables contained in the Substitution parameter are considered.

Specified by:
unify in interface Term
Parameters:
t - the Term to unify.
alpha - the prior binding variables.
Returns:
the most general unifier or null if it does not exist. An empty mgu means that there is no binding Variable between t and this term.
Throws:
UnificationException - if t is not an instance of Variable.

applySubstitution

public java.lang.Object applySubstitution(Substitution alpha,
                                          boolean replaceVar)
Returns a new Term such that the variables appearing in the Substitution are replaced with the corresponding Term in the Substitution.

Specified by:
applySubstitution in interface Substituable
Parameters:
alpha - the Substitution to apply.
replaceVar - flag to indicate that if the Substitution not allows to instantiate all variables of the Term replace by a Constant with the Variable name.
Returns:
the substituted copy of the Term.
